mapper.update: update mh_service_link set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_path = #{iconPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, icon_path, link, sort, created_at, updated_at from mh_service_link
